entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or light snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
